::Needlenose/Scrapper::
Needlenose spun around half scared and half ready to kill something. 
He quickly raised Sunstreak to the bots face. 
"Ahhh..." he screamed a war cry still wanting to prove his worth but 
to scared to damge himself in a fight.

Scrapper turned. "Yes, I suppose Megatron is dead, but HAvotron shall 
live forever.  Hmm yes." He looked to his plans and pondered. 
'If we were to move the engine here, then create a cockpit on the 
bottom, we may be able to create a more defensible ship and a more 
destructive one.' he thought to himself. Lifting a large sheet of 
fusion heated glassetal (it's my cool form of super tough 
cybertronian glass). He inserted into the cockpit.  "Here to 
mixmaster" 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> All of a sudden, Needlenose could feel a light tap on his shoulder.
> 
> _________________________________________
> 
> Hook turned around from his work, and started to speak, but didn't 
sound
> to interested. "What do you mean? Megatron has been dead for a long
> time, but if that new renegade Havotron wants us, we might as well 
take
> it. Besides, there has got to be a reason the Predacons have been
> telling us to build this ship." he says, motioning to their creative
> work. He turned around to face Scrapper, and transformed into his 
crane
> mode. The hook part swiveled on it's base, then picked up an engine
> piece. He then lifted it, and swiveled back to place, letting the 
engine
> go into the front of the ship. "It's all yours Mixmaster." he said,
> talking down.
